history.content:
I just got a C- in CS189, and now I am super worried because I was supposed to graduate. All other CS upper div courses I have taken, I have gotten a C or higher. Am in danger of not being able to graduate? I just read here https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/cs/degree-reqs-upperdiv 

that "All upper division courses applied toward the major must be completed with an overall GPA of 2.0 or above"

So does that mean it is okay if I got a C- in 189 as long as my cumulative GPA for all CS upper div courses comes out to be above 2.0? Am I safe?
history.subject: Getting a C- in upper div
